section.label: Profile
section.description: Edit your user details and avatar.

picture.label: {user}'s Profile picture
picture.description: Your profile picture that appears throughout the interface.

section.label: User interface
section.description: Customize the look, feel, and behavior of the interface.

dim-desktop.label: Dim desktop
dim-desktop.description: Dim the desktop when panels or menus are open.

border-radius.label: Border radius
border-radius.description: Controls the corner roundness of windows, buttons, and other elements.

section.label: Screen corners
section.description: Customize screen corner rounding and visual effects.

show-corners.label: Show screen corners
show-corners.description: Display rounded corners on the edge of the screen.

solid-black.label: Solid black corners
solid-black.description: Use solid black instead of the bar background color.

section.label: Fonts
section.description: Choose the fonts used throughout the interface.

default.label: Default font
default.description: Main font used throughout the interface.

monospace.label: Monospaced font
monospace.description: Monospaced font used for numbers and stats display.

accent.label: Accent font
accent.description: Large font used for prominent displays.

section.label: Volumes
section.description: Adjust volume controls and audio levels.

mute-output.label: Mute audio output
mute-output.description: Mute the system's main audio output.

step-size.label: Volume step size
step-size.description: Adjust the step size for volume changes (scroll wheel, keyboard shortcuts).

section.label: Audio devices
section.description: Configure available audio input and output devices.

output-device.label: Output device
output-device.description: Select the desired audio output device.

input-device.label: Input device
input-device.description: Select the desired audio input device.

section.label: Media players
section.description: Set your preferred and ignored media applications.

primary-player.label: Primary player
primary-player.description: Enter a keyword to identify your main player.

excluded-player.label: Excluded player
excluded-player.description: Add keywords for players you want the system to ignore. Each keyword should be on a new line.

visualizer-type.label: Visualization type
visualizer-type.description: Choose a visualization type for media playback

frame-rate.label: Frame rate
frame-rate.description: Higher rates are smoother but use more resources.

section.label: Per-monitor settings
section.description: Adjust scaling and brightness for each display.

brightness-step.label: Brightness step size
brightness-step.description: Adjust the step size for brightness changes (scroll wheel and keyboard shortcuts).

section.label: Night light
section.description: Reduce blue light emission to help you sleep better and reduce eye strain.

enable.label: Enable night light
enable.description: Apply a warm color filter to reduce blue light emission.

temperature.label: Color temperature
temperature.description: Set the color warmth for nighttime and daytime.

auto-schedule.label: Automatic scheduling
auto-schedule.description: Based on the sunset and sunrise time in {location} - recommended.

manual-schedule.label: Manual scheduling
manual-schedule.description: Set custom times for sunrise and sunset.

force-activation.label: Force activation
force-activation.description: Ignores the schedule and applies the night filter immediately.

section.label: Appearance
section.description: Customize the bar's appearance and position.

position.label: Bar position
position.description: Choose where to place the bar on the screen.

density.label: Bar density
density.description: Adjust the bar's padding for a compact or spacious look.

background-opacity.label: Background opacity
background-opacity.description: Adjust the background opacity of the bar.

floating.label: Floating bar
floating.description: Displays the bar as a floating 'pill'. Note: This will move the screen corners to the edges.

margins.label: Margins
margins.description: Adjust the margins around the floating bar.

section.label: Widgets positioning
section.description: Drag and drop widgets to reorder them within each section, or use the add/remove buttons to manage widgets.

section.label: Monitor display
section.description: Show bar on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.

section.label: Appearance
section.description: Customize the dock's behavior and appearance.

auto-hide.label: Auto-hide
auto-hide.description: Automatically hide when not in use.

floating-distance.label: Dock floating distance
floating-distance.description: Adjust the floating distance from the screen edge.

section.label: Monitor display
section.description: Choose which monitor to display the dock on.

section.label: Appearance
section.description: Customize the launcher's behavior and appearance.

position.label: Position
position.description: Choose where the launcher panel appears.

background-opacity.label: Background opacity
background-opacity.description: Adjust the background opacity of the launcher.

clipboard-history.label: Enable clipboard history
clipboard-history.description: Access previously copied items from the launcher.

sort-by-usage.label: Sort by most used
sort-by-usage.description: When enabled, frequently launched apps appear first in the list.

use-app2unit.label: Use App2Unit to launch applications
use-app2unit.description: Uses an alternative launch method to better manage app processes and prevent issues.

section.label: Appearance
section.description: Configure notifications appearance and behavior.

do-not-disturb.label: Do not disturb
do-not-disturb.description: Disable all notification popups when enabled.

enable-osd.label: Enable on screen display
enable-osd.description: Show volume and brightness changes in real-time.

low-urgency.label: Low urgency
low-urgency.description: How long low priority notifications stay visible.

normal-urgency.label: Normal urgency
normal-urgency.description: How long normal priority notifications stay visible.

critical-urgency.label: Critical urgency
critical-urgency.description: How long critical priority notifications stay visible.

monitors-display.label: Monitors display
monitors-display.description: Show notification on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.

section.label: Wallpaper settings
section.description: Control how wallpapers are managed and displayed.

enable-management.label: Enable wallpaper management
enable-management.description: Manage wallpapers with Noctalia. Uncheck if you prefer using another application.

folder.label: Wallpaper folder
folder.description: Path to your main wallpaper folder.

monitor-specific.label: Monitor-specific directories
monitor-specific.description: Set a different wallpaper folder for each monitor.

fill-mode.label: Fill mode
fill-mode.description: Select how the image should scale to match your monitor's resolution.

fill-color.label: Fill color
fill-color.description: Choose a fill color that may appear behind the wallpaper.

transition-type.label: Transition type
transition-type.description: Animation type when switching between wallpapers.

transition-duration.label: Transition duration
transition-duration.description: Duration of transition animations in seconds.

edge-smoothness.label: Soften transition edge
edge-smoothness.description: Applies a soft, feathered effect to the edge of transitions.

random-wallpaper.label: Random wallpaper
random-wallpaper.description: Schedule random wallpaper changes at regular intervals.

interval.label: Wallpaper interval
interval.description: How often to change wallpapers automatically.

section.label: Color source
section.description: Main settings for Noctalia's colors.

dark-mode.label: Dark mode
dark-mode.description: Switches to a darker theme for easier viewing at night.

enable-matugen.label: Enable Matugen
enable-matugen.description: Automatically generate colors based on your active wallpaper.

section.label: Predefined color schemes
section.description: To use these color schemes, you must turn off Matugen. With Matugen enabled, colors are automatically generated from your wallpaper.

section.label: Matugen templates
section.description: Apply colors to external applications.

ui.label: UI
ui.description: Desktop environment and UI toolkit theming.

kitty.label: Kitty
kitty.description-missing: Requires kitty terminal to be installed

ghostty.label: Ghostty
ghostty.description-missing: Requires ghostty terminal to be installed

foot.label: Foot
foot.description-missing: Requires foot terminal to be installed

fuzzel.label: Fuzzel
fuzzel.description-missing: Requires fuzzel launcher to be installed

vesktop.label: Vesktop
vesktop.description-missing: Requires vesktop Discord client to be installed

pywalfox.label: Pywalfox (Firefox)
pywalfox.description-missing: Requires pywalfox package to be installed

section.label: Your location
section.description: Get accurate weather and night light scheduling by setting your location.

section.label: Weather
section.description: Choose your preferred temperature unit.

fahrenheit.label: Display temperature in Fahrenheit (°F)
fahrenheit.description: Display temperature in Fahrenheit instead of Celsius.

section.label: Date & time
section.description: Customize how date and time appear.

12hour-format.label: Use 12-hour time format on the lock screen
12hour-format.description: On for AM/PM format (e.g., 8:00 PM), off for 24-hour format (e.g., 20:00).

week-numbers.label: Show week numbers
week-numbers.description: Displays the week of the year (e.g., Week 38) in the calendar.

section.description: Manage Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connections.

section.label: General settings
section.description: Manage screen recording output and content.

output-folder.label: Output folder
output-folder.description: Folder where screen recordings will be saved.

show-cursor.label: Show cursor
show-cursor.description: Record mouse cursor in the video.

section.label: Video settings
section.description: Configure video recording options.

video-source.label: Video source
video-source.description: Portal is recommended, if you get artifacts try Screen.

frame-rate.label: Frame rate
frame-rate.description: Target frame rate for screen recordings.

video-quality.label: Video quality
video-quality.description: Higher quality results in larger file sizes.

video-codec.label: Video codec
video-codec.description: h264 is the most common codec.

color-range.label: Color range
color-range.description: Limited is recommended for better compatibility.

section.label: Audio settings
section.description: Configure audio recording options.

audio-source.label: Audio source
audio-source.description: Audio source to capture during recording.

audio-codec.label: Audio codec
audio-codec.description: Opus is recommended for best performance and smallest audio size.

section.label: Noctalia shell
section.description: A sleek and minimal desktop shell thoughtfully crafted for Wayland, built with Quickshell.

section.label: Contributors
section.description: Shout-out to our {count} awesome contributor!

section.label: System hooks
section.description: Configure commands to be executed when system events occur.

enable.label: Enable hooks
enable.description: Enable or disable all hook commands.

wallpaper-changed.label: Wallpaper changed
wallpaper-changed.description: Command to be executed when wallpaper changes.

theme-changed.label: Theme changed
theme-changed.description: Command to be executed when theme toggles between dark and light mode.

command-info.label: Hook Command Information
command-info.description:
• Commands are executed via shell (sh -c)
• Commands run in background (detached)
• Test buttons execute with current values

parameters.label: Available Parameters
parameters.description:
• Wallpaper Hook: $1 = wallpaper path, $2 = screen name
• Theme Toggle Hook: $1 = true/false (dark mode state)
